changeSet.sql: create table if not exists doctors ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), password VARCHAR(50), specialization VARCHAR(255), hospital VARCHAR(255), hospital_address VARCHAR(255), rating NUMERIC(3, 2), years_of_experience INTEGER, education VARCHAR(255), office_hours VARCHAR(50), contact_number VARCHAR(20), role VARCHAR(20), created_at timestamp default now(), is_deleted boolean default false NOT NULL );
